name: memex (memex-life)
description: [项目级] Your second brain for the web browsing. An AI powered Chrome extension that constructs personal knowledge base for you. 。来源: https://github.com/memex-life/memex

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
This project aims to create a browser extension that acts like a personal memex machine.
It will keep track of everything you browse online to build your own knowledge base.
Then it will use AI to retrieve that knowledge whenever you need it.

**What is a Memex?**
> Consider a future device for individual use, which is a sort of mechanized private file and library. It needs a name, and, to coin one at random, “memex” will do. A memex is a device in which an individual stores all his books, records, and communications, and which is mechanized so that it may be consulted with exceeding speed and flexibility. It is an enlarged intimate supplement to his memory.   
> --- “As We May Think”  Vannevar Bush (1945)

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
LICENSE
README.md
jest.config.js
package-lock.json
package.json
public
public/icon.png
public/manifest.json
public/options.html
public/popup.html
server
server/README.md
server/knowledgeBase.py
server/server.py
src
src/background.ts
src/components
src/content_script.tsx
src/options.tsx
src/popup.tsx

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- Seamlessly captures content and metadata from your web browsing.
- Constructs your own personalized knowledge base on your local device
- Retrive knowledge with power of AI.

name: memex/public 模块
description: [模块级] memex 项目的 public 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/memex-life/memex

类型: source
文件数: 4

name: memex/server 模块
description: [模块级] memex 项目的 server 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/memex-life/memex

genes.title: server 模块说明
genes.content:
Currently the [LangchainJs](https://github.com/hwchase17/langchainjs) has not yet support browser runtime. The extension still needs a backend server as Knowledge Base implementaion. 

set environments:
```
export TOKENIZERS_PARALLELISM=false
export OPENAI_API_KEY=<your-api-key>
cd server
FLASK_APP=server flask run
```

genes.title: server 代码示例
genes.content:
export TOKENIZERS_PARALLELISM=false
export OPENAI_API_KEY=<your-api-key>
cd server
FLASK_APP=server flask run
